item.title: 莱斯库雷表示，法国将履行实现赤字目标的承诺
item.description: 法国看守财政部长罗兰-莱斯库雷（Roland Lescure）表示，即使在即将卸任的总理塞巴斯蒂安-勒科尔努（Sebastien Lecornu）表示明年的财政整顿力度将小于之前的计划之后，法国仍将履行其对欧盟的预算承诺。【原文：France’s caretaker finance minister, Roland Lescure, said the country is on course to meet its budget promises to the European Union, even after outgoing premier Sebastien Lecornu indicated there will be less fiscal consolidation next year than previously planned.】

item.title: 阿美石油公司推迟化工扩建计划，原因是石油疲软，亚洲成为关注焦点
item.description: 据熟悉情况的人士透露，由于油价疲软挤压了当地开支，沙特阿美公司已搁置了三个化学品扩建项目，并优先考虑国际投资。【原文：Saudi Aramco has put three chemicals expansion projects on hold as weaker oil prices squeeze local spending and it prioritizes international investments, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 中国监管机构出台措施遏制价格战
item.description: 中国最高经济规划机构和市场监管部门公布了旨在遏制无序价格竞争的新措施，警告过度的价格战和低于成本的竞标正在损害行业发展，并最终影响中国的经济增长。【原文：China’s top economic planning agency and market regulator have unveiled new measures aimed at curbing disorderly price competition, warning that excessive price wars and below-cost bidding are undermining industry development and ultimately the country’s economic growth.】

item.title: 世界银行敦促肯尼亚提高消费税以援助经济
item.description: 世界银行提出了一系列改革建议，称这将促进肯尼亚经济发展，加快创造就业机会，提高企业竞争力。【原文：The World Bank has recommended a series of reforms it says will boost Kenya’s economy, accelerate job creation, and enhance business competitiveness.】

item.title: Lyft 计划从 2027 年起配备数百辆张量机器人汽车
item.description: Lyft 公司正与自动驾驶汽车开发商 Tensor Auto 公司合作，从 2027 年开始在欧洲和北美部署一支由数百辆机器人axis 组成的车队。【原文：Lyft Inc. is partnering with autonomous vehicle developer Tensor Auto Inc. to deploy a fleet of hundreds of robotaxis in Europe and North America starting in 2027.】

item.title: 英特尔发布新技术，CEO扭亏为盈的关键时刻到了
item.description: 英特尔公司是一家陷入困境的芯片制造商，目前得到了美国政府的支持，该公司推出了新产品和制造技术，这是其扭亏为盈的核心所在。【原文：Intel Corp., the embattled chipmaker now backed by the US government, introduced new products and manufacturing technology that are central to its turnaround bid.】

item.title: Salesforce 推出 IT 产品，加深与 ServiceNow 的竞争
item.description: Salesforce Inc. 将推出一款信息技术管理产品，进军该公司软件的新领域，并加深与 ServiceNow Inc.【原文：Salesforce Inc. is launching a product for information technology management, moving into a new area for the company’s software and deepening its competition with ServiceNow Inc.】

item.title: 大米基准价格创 10 年新低，缓解粮食价格压力
item.description: 亚洲基准大米价格跌至十年来的最低水平，这预示着家庭和依赖进口的国家将面临更低廉的食品价格。【原文：Asia’s benchmark rice price fell to its lowest level in a decade, signaling cheaper food bills ahead for households and import-dependent nations.】

item.title: 特朗普的木材关税即将到来。谁将首当其冲
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统宣布对进口木材和木制品征收全面关税，他的政府称这是保护美国经济和促进国内制造业所必需的。从 10 月 14 日开始，软木木材将面临 10% 的关税，而厨柜、浴室柜和其他木制成品将被征收 25% 的关税，并在 1 月份进一步提高。【原文：President Donald Trump unveiled sweeping tariffs on imported lumber and wood products that his administration says are needed to protect the US economy and boost domestic manufacturing. Starting Oct. 14, softwood lumber will face 10% duties, while kitchen cabinets, bathroom vanities, and other finished wood goods will be hit with 25% tariffs that rise further in January.】

item.title: 摩根大通寻求加速进军印度支付服务市场
item.description: 摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. is accelerating its push into India’s payments sector as the Wall Street bank aims to leverage the country’s growing interconnectedness with foreign companies.】

item.title: 墨西哥 9 月通胀率上升，墨西哥银行将进一步削减开支
item.description: 在决策者上月底连续第 10 次降息之后，墨西哥上个月的年度通胀加速度略低于预期，保持在央行目标区间的上限以下。【原文：Mexico’s annual inflation accelerated slightly less than expected last month, staying below the top of the central bank’s target range after policymakers delivered a 10th straight rate cut late last month.】

item.title: 白银自亨特兄弟挤兑以来首次触及 50 美元
item.description: 由于对避险资产的需求激增加剧了伦敦金银市场的供应紧张，现货白银价格跃升至数十年来的最高水平。【原文：Spot silver prices jumped to the highest level in decades as surging demand for safe-haven assets exacerbated supply constraints in the London bullion market.】

item.title: 当地债券收益率下降，尼日利亚银行转向放贷
item.description: 随着国债收益率的下降，尼日利亚银行正计划专注于其核心业务--贷款。【原文：Nigerian banks are planning to focus on their core business of lending as yields on government debt decline.】

item.title: 能源减免优惠到期后巴西通胀加速
item.description: 在临时能源信贷结束并导致电费大幅上涨之后，巴西的通货膨胀在 9 月份加速。【原文：Brazil’s inflation accelerated in September after a temporary energy credit came to an end and led to sharply higher electricity costs.】

item.title: 美联储鲍曼从华尔街贷款人转向社区银行
item.description: 美联储银行业最高级别的官员正在启动一项工作，一些高管希望这将是加强对社区贷款人关注的开端。【原文：The Federal Reserve’s top banking cop is kicking off what some executives hope will be the start of an increased focus on community lenders.】

item.title: 谷歌云与微软、OpenAI 争夺工作场所人工智能
item.description: 谷歌的云计算部门正在推出一个名为 "双子座企业"（Gemini Enterprise）的人工智能平台，希望该平台能惠及普通员工，从而与微软公司和 OpenAI 在商业工具领域展开更深入的竞争。【原文：Google’s cloud unit is launching an artificial intelligence platform called Gemini Enterprise that it hopes will reach everyday workers, setting up a deeper competition with Microsoft Corp. and OpenAI for business tools.】

item.title: 中行罗杰斯称银行业 "寡头垄断 "证明竞争困境
item.description: 加拿大银行的二把手称加拿大的银行系统为 "寡头垄断"，并以该行业为例，说明有限的竞争是如何限制经济增长的。【原文：The Bank of Canada’s second in command called the country’s banking system an “oligopoly,” using the sector as a key example of how limited competition is restricting growth.】

item.title: 高盛认为南非债券和股票将获得更多收益
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：South African bonds and stocks are set to extend this year’s rally, boosted by slowing inflation and strong mining stocks, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc. strategists.】

item.title: 欧洲央行官员决定不因通胀风险而削减保护性货币政策
item.description: 欧洲中央银行官员在 9 月份的会议上考虑再次降息，但最终决定在通胀风险上行的情况下不予考虑。【原文：European Central Bank officials considered another interest-rate cut in September but ultimately decided against it amid upside inflation risks, according to an account of their September meeting.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦 Ijara 公司收购 Sindlab 公司，拓展医疗保健业务
item.description: 巴基斯坦私募股权和风险投资公司 Ijara Capital Partners Ltd. 收购了诊断连锁店 Sindlab Pvt.，扩大了其在医疗保健领域的业务。【原文：Pakistan’s private equity and venture capital firm Ijara Capital Partners Ltd., has acquired diagnostics chain Sindlab Pvt., expanding its presence in the health care sector.】

item.title: 看涨期权需求上升预示新兴市场本币债券上涨
item.description: 期权交易商押注新兴市场本币债券在未来三个月内至少上涨 10%，对该资产类别的乐观程度为 16 个月来最高。【原文：Options traders are betting on at least a 10% gain in emerging-market local-currency bonds over the next three months, turning the most optimistic on the asset class in 16 months.】

item.title: 罗马尼亚央行行长认为至少到 3 月份利率将保持稳定
item.description: 罗马尼亚中央银行的一位董事会成员表示，罗马尼亚可能会将利率维持在欧洲最高水平之一，至少到 3 月底，以帮助抑制通胀飙升。【原文：Romania will likely keep interest rates at one of the highest levels in Europe at least until the end March to help contain an inflation spike, according to a central bank board member.】

item.title: 美国氢能再获投资者青睐
item.description:
人工智能驱动的电力需求热潮正在掩盖清洁能源面临的政治阻力。【原文：

The frenzy for AI-driven power demand is overshadowing political headwinds for the clean energy source.

item.title: ChatGPT 的新应用程序集成询问了大量用户
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日时事通讯。今天，娜塔莉-龙（Natalie Lung）撰文介绍了在使用 ChatGPT 的新应用程序集成时令人难以接受、有时甚至令人沮丧的体验。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Natalie Lung writes about the underwhelming and sometimes frustrating experience of using ChatGPT’s new app integrations.】

item.title: 艰难的德国工业考验默茨的改革雄心
item.description: 我是克里斯-安斯蒂（Chris Anstey），波士顿的经济编辑，今天我们将关注德国经济令人担忧的迹象。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Chris Anstey, an economics editor in Boston, and today we’re looking at worrying signs from the German economy. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: Netflix 期待 "KPOP "反弹。埃隆-马斯克和关税阻碍了发展
item.description: 凭借强劲的盈利和雄心勃勃的增长计划，Netflix 公司的股价在今年上半年一路高歌猛进。但这一涨势现在停滞不前，因为一对不寻常的风险让投资者质疑该公司过高的估值。【原文：Netflix Inc. shares romped through the first half of the year on strong earnings and ambitious growth plans. But that rally is now stalled as a pair of unusual risks has investors questioning the company’s elevated valuation.】

item.title: Keith Rabois 通过初创公司 Spellbook 押注法律人工智能技术
item.description: 人工智能初创公司 Spellbook 在 Khosla Ventures 管理合伙人 Keith Rabois — 领投的一轮融资中筹集了 5000 万美元，使该公司成为为从事法律行业的人工智能公司提供资金支持的最新风投机构。【原文：Artificial intelligence startup Spellbook raised $50 million in a funding round led by Khosla Ventures managing partner Keith Rabois — making the firm the latest venture player to bankroll AI companies tackling the legal industry.】

item.title: 特朗普关税的现实开始在德国贸易数据中显现
item.description: 尽管由于政府关门，美国的经济数据供不应求，但世界第三大出口国发布的数据继续显示，唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税政策正在对全球产生何种影响。【原文：While economic data in the US are in short supply because of the government shutdown, releases from the world’s third-largest export power continue to show what impact President Donald Trump’s tariffs are having across the world.】

item.title: 巴西 Ambipar 公司曾因 ESG 认证而备受赞誉，如今却因治理问题而一蹶不振
item.description: 在短短三周多的时间里，陷入困境的巴西废物管理公司 Ambipar Participações e Empreendimentos SA 就从让投资者放心到申请破产的边缘。【原文：In just over three weeks, troubled Brazilian waste-management company Ambipar Participações e Empreendimentos SA went from reassuring investors to the brink of a bankruptcy filing.】

item.title: 落后的住宅建筑商股票面临比尔-普尔特的新担忧
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统和联邦住房金融局局长比尔-普尔特（Bill Pulte）正在加剧本已陷入困境的住宅建筑商股票的抛售。【原文：President Donald Trump and Federal Housing Finance Agency Director Bill Pulte are fueling a deeper selloff in already struggling homebuilder stocks.】
